content: The Rat Governor's power strikes your foe with lightning summoned from his staff. The equipped effect increases Thunder Damage, making this move even stronger. The Kang-Jin Staff weapon also deals Thunder Damage, so combining that with the Rat Governor Spirit will make the most out of all three effects.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Governor_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Governor Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Governor Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Governor's power strikes your foe with lightning summoned from his staff. The equipped effect increases Thunder Damage, making this move even stronger. The Kang-Jin Staff weapon also deals Thunder Damage, so combining that with the Rat Governor Spirit will make the most out of all three effects.
